title: Joining Queue/Starting game
body: I've gone through a few forums/threads to check to see if anyone else has this problem but didn't come across much. The problem is i can log in to league and look for a game but (i assume) whenever i find a game (accept/decline doesn't pop up) it comes up with connection error then constantly just says retrieving data from server. i tried a custom match against bots and i was in champ select but when the timer hit 0 it just sat there in champ select going no where which is why i assume the error only pops up when the accept/decline option comes up due to it being random (10 second or 2 minutes into looking for match). any one else have/had this problem?

replies.body: Bump. would really like some help? considering i did the fucking recommended fixes and now my client won't fucking update.
